summary: The module implements the core neural components used to build Jasper acoustic models for speech recognition, including masked 1‑D convolutions that respect sequence length masks, squeeze‑and‑excitation gating, parallel execution of compatible Jasper blocks with configurable aggregation and residual connections, and utilities for shuffling grouped channels and handling padding and weight initialization.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, high‑performance building block library that enables developers to construct and train Jasper‑style ASR models capable of processing variable‑length audio inputs with efficient convolutional operations and channel‑wise attention mechanisms.
